channel.title: 金融时报
channel.description: 这是一个追踪金融时报news的种子

item.title: 亨特决定终止税收减免政策，这让非英国籍富豪们 "大失所望"。"没有人想到保守党会做出这样的决定......我们将离开伦敦，搬到瑞士去。"但一些人将急于以12%的优惠税率将资产转移到*英国。
item.description:
Rich non-doms ‘dismayed’ by Hunt’s decision to end tax breaks

“Nobody expected this from the Tories…We’re going to leave London and move to Switzerland.”

But some will rush to move assets *into* the UK at reduced 12% rate.

w/ @HarrietAgnew and FT teamhttps://t.co/eHInPr0TQF

— Michael O'Dwyer (@_MODwyer) March 8, 2024

item.title: 失业对你有好处吗？其实不然--但有一项统计表明，失业会大大降低死亡率。那么，到底发生了什么？它能给我们带来什么启示？
item.description:
Is unemployment good for you? Not really - but one statistic suggests unemployment dramatically reduces mortality. So what's going on? And what might it teach us about Net Zero?https://t.co/DxMPHaPlMy pic.twitter.com/T6ndlPOj2W

— Tim Harford (@TimHarford) March 8, 2024

item.title: 观点：乔-拜登越能引导人们关注唐纳德-特朗普的个人崇拜所带来的恐惧，他就越能乐在其中。
item.description:
Opinion: The more Joe Biden can direct people’s attention to the fear around Donald Trump’s personality cult, the more he will enjoy himself. https://t.co/iQEoR9RE87 pic.twitter.com/3UoxnmmYu0

— Financial Times (@FT) March 8, 2024

item.title: 乔-拜登（Joe Biden）在向国会发表的国情咨文演讲中毫不掩饰自己的政治立场，誓言要为美国和全世界的 "民主和自由 "而战。
item.description:
In a punchy, fiery State of the Union address, Joe Biden vowed to fight for ‘democracy and freedom’ in the US and around the world in an unabashedly political speech to Congress https://t.co/bkIr2iJ4YJ pic.twitter.com/u4VLCpw88N

— Financial Times (@FT) March 8, 2024

item.title: 美国总统乔-拜登发表了他在 11 月总统大选前的最后一次国情咨文演讲。有哪些关键时刻？
item.description:
US President Joe Biden delivered his final State of the Union address before November’s presidential election. What were the key moments? https://t.co/FSSMI1QAA3 pic.twitter.com/aQM66sfwZ3

— Financial Times (@FT) March 8, 2024

item.title: "共和党长椅上有许多地道的特朗普主义者。也有几十个麦康奈尔人在向一个他们私下鄙视的人致敬。拜登越能把人们的注意力引向围绕这个邪教的恐惧，就越好。我对拜登最好的评价。
item.description:
"There are many authentic Trumpians on the Republican benches. There are also dozens of McConnells paying homage to a man they privately despise. The more Biden can direct attention to the fear around the cult, the better." My take on Biden at his best. https://t.co/BR6jmI8cQE

— Edward Luce (@EdwardGLuce) March 8, 2024
